channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Robotic Process Automation with Automation Anywhere
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Robotic Process Automation with Automation Anywhere

item.title: CVE-2019-4297|2024-09-17T01:22:02.853Z -- ibm -- robotic%20process%20automation%20with%20automation%20anywhere
item.description: IBM Robotic Process Automation with Automation Anywhere 11 could allow a remote authenticated attacker to conduct an LDAP injection. By using a specially crafted request, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to make unauthorized queries or modify the LDAP content. IBM X-Force ID: 160761.

item.title: CVE-2020-4901|2024-09-17T00:51:56.265Z -- ibm -- robotic%20process%20automation%20with%20automation%20anywhere
item.description: IBM Robotic Process Automation with Automation Anywhere 11.0 could allow an attacker on the network to obtain sensitive information or cause a denial of service through username enumeration. IBM X-Force ID: 190992.

item.title: CVE-2018-1876|2024-09-17T01:16:31.146Z -- ibm -- robotic%20process%20automation%20with%20automation%20anywhere
item.description: IBM Robotic Process Automation with Automation Anywhere 11 could under certain cases, display the password in a Control Room log file after installation. IBM X-Force ID: 151707.

item.title: CVE-2018-1795|2024-09-17T01:00:38.481Z -- ibm -- robotic%20process%20automation%20with%20automation%20anywhere
item.description: IBM Robotic Process Automation with Automation Anywhere Enterprise 10 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 149073.

item.title: CVE-2019-4296|2024-09-17T01:20:46.808Z -- ibm -- robotic%20process%20automation%20with%20automation%20anywhere
item.description: IBM Robotic Process Automation with Automation Anywhere 11 information disclosure could allow a local user to obtain e-mail contents from the client debug log file. IBM X-Force ID: 160759.

item.title: CVE-2018-1514|2024-09-17T00:16:37.345Z -- ibm -- robotic%20process%20automation%20with%20automation%20anywhere
item.description: IBM Robotic Process Automation with Automation Anywhere 10.0 is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery which could allow an attacker to execute malicious and unauthorized actions transmitted from a user that the website trusts. IBM X-Force ID: 141622.
